trends: There has been one other sighting in Randle
There were no other sightings in Randle on or around August 13th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailswatching the Perseids meteor show out bed room window early morning of the 13th of august and this fireball type thing was going east to west and then the last second turned back to east and disappeared and then after it disappeared a flash happened like when lighting happens but there was no clouds or lighting.it only appeared for a few seconds. just wondering if anyone else saw what i saw i told my dad and he seemed intrigued by it .im wondering if im sane after i saw that i cant stop thinking of it
Summary: Streak of fireball took a turn east.
